name: HSP_ACCT_ICDPX_ALT
description: This table contains the hospital account alternate ICD procedures from the hospital account (HAR) master file. Alternate ICD procedures will be specified if hospital accounts are coded with two sets of ICD codes.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ICD_PX_ALT_ID
columns.description: The alternate ICD procedures stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: ICD_PX_ALT_ID_ICD_PX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ICD procedure record.

columns.name: ICD_PX_ALT_DATE
columns.description: The alternate ICD procedure service date.

columns.name: ICD_PX_ALT_PROV_ID
columns.description: The alternate ICD procedure performing provider.

columns.name: ICD_PX_ALT_EVNT_NUM
columns.description: The alternate ICD procedure event link number.

columns.name: ICD_PX_ALT_EXCLD_YN
columns.description: The alternate ICD procedure exclude from clinical reporting data.

columns.name: ICD_PX_ALT_AFSOI_YN
columns.description: The alternate ICD procedure affects severity of illness data.

columns.name: ICD_PX_ALT_AFROM_YN
columns.description: The alternate ICD procedure affects risk of mortality data.
